message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.IR 

This paper deals with the task of temporally grounding textual queries in videos, which involves understanding both visual and textual information. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the Computer Vision (cs.CV) and Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) sub-categories. The proposed model also involves attention mechanisms and learning from weakly-supervised data, which are common topics in Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Multimedia (cs.MM) sub-categories. Additionally, the task of grounding textual queries in videos can be seen as a form of information retrieval, which falls under the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category.
